User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user profile within the ConnectVerse application, including personal details, social connections, and gamification attributes.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

username.description: Unique username chosen by the user.

displayName.description: The name displayed to other users.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL to the user's avatar image.

bio.description: A short biographical description provided by the user.

statusMessage.description: A custom status message set by the user.

lastOnlineAt.description: Timestamp of the user's last known online activity.

totalExperiencePoints.description: Accumulated experience points for the user, contributing to their level and leaderboard ranking.

blockedUserIds.description: References to Users that this user has blocked. (Relationship: User N:N User)

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last update to the user's profile.

Invitation.title: Invitation
Invitation.description: Represents a direct invitation for a user to join a community.

ContactFormSubmission.title: ContactFormSubmission
ContactFormSubmission.description: Represents a message sent to the admin team via the contact form.

Conversation.title: Conversation
Conversation.description: Represents a private direct message conversation between users.

Friendship.title: Friendship
Friendship.description: Represents a friendship or follow relationship between two users, including its status.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Friendship entity.

requesterId.description: Reference to the User who initiated the friendship request. (Relationship: User 1:N Friendship)

addresseeId.description: Reference to the User who received the friendship request. (Relationship: User 1:N Friendship)

status.description: The current status of the friendship request (e.g., 'pending', 'accepted', 'rejected', 'unfriended').

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the friendship request was initiated.

respondedAt.description: Timestamp when the friendship request was accepted or rejected.

Community.title: Community
Community.description: Represents a server or community where users can interact through channels.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Community entity.

ownerId.description: Reference to the User who owns the community. (Relationship: User 1:N Community)

members.description: List of user IDs who are members of this community.

isPublic.description: Indicates if the community is public or private.

communityIconUrl.description: URL to the community's icon or logo.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the community was created.

Channel.title: Channel
Channel.description: Represents a communication channel within a community, used for text, voice, or video.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Channel entity.

communityId.description: Reference to the Community this channel belongs to. (Relationship: Community 1:N Channel)

topic.description: A brief topic or description for the channel.

isPrivate.description: Indicates if the channel is private and only accessible to specific roles/members.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the channel was created.

Role.title: Role
Role.description: Defines a set of permissions within a specific community.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Role entity.

communityId.description: Reference to the Community this role belongs to. (Relationship: Community 1:N Role)

permissions.description: A list of permission strings granted by this role (e.g., 'sendMessage', 'kickUser', 'manageChannels').

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the role was created.

UserRole.title: UserRole
UserRole.description: Junction entity representing a user's assigned role within a specific community.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserRole entity.

userId.description: Reference to the User. (Relationship: User N:N Role)

roleId.description: Reference to the Role. (Relationship: User N:N Role)

communityId.description: Reference to the Community where this role assignment applies. (Relationship: Community 1:N UserRole)

assignedAt.description: Timestamp when the role was assigned to the user.

InviteLink.title: InviteLink
InviteLink.description: Represents an invite link for a community, allowing new users to join.

id.description: Unique identifier for the InviteLink entity.

communityId.description: Reference to the Community this invite link is for. (Relationship: Community 1:N InviteLink)

creatorId.description: Reference to the User who created this invite link. (Relationship: User 1:N InviteLink)

code.description: The unique code for the invite link.

expiresAt.description: Timestamp when the invite link will expire.

maxUses.description: Maximum number of times this invite link can be used.

currentUses.description: Current number of times this invite link has been used.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the invite link was created.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single message sent in a channel or direct message.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Message entity.

channelId.description: Reference to the Channel where the message was sent. (Relationship: Channel 1:N Message)

senderId.description: Reference to the User who sent the message. (Relationship: User 1:N Message)

content.description: The text content of the message, potentially including rich text formatting (e.g., Markdown).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the message was sent.

readBy.description: References to Users who have read this message. (Relationship: Message N:N User)

editedAt.description: Timestamp when the message was last edited.

deletedAt.description: Timestamp when the message was deleted.

replyToMessageId.description: Reference to another Message this message is a reply to, if applicable. (Relationship: Message 1:N Message)

quotedMessageId.description: Reference to another Message this message is quoting, if applicable. (Relationship: Message 1:N Message)

mediaAttachmentIds.description: References to MediaAttachment entities associated with this message. (Relationship: Message N:N MediaAttachment)

mentionUserIds.description: References to Users explicitly mentioned in this message. (Relationship: Message N:N User)

hashtags.description: A list of hashtags used in the message content.

isPinned.description: Indicates if the message is pinned in the channel.

MessageReaction.title: MessageReaction
MessageReaction.description: Represents a user's reaction (emoji) to a specific message.

id.description: Unique identifier for the MessageReaction entity.

messageId.description: Reference to the Message being reacted to. (Relationship: Message 1:N MessageReaction)

userId.description: Reference to the User who added the reaction. (Relationship: User 1:N MessageReaction)

emoji.description: The emoji character used for the reaction (e.g., 'üëç', '‚ù§Ô∏è').

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the reaction was added.

ExperiencePointActivity.title: ExperiencePointActivity
ExperiencePointActivity.description: Records individual instances of a user gaining experience points, serving as an XP history.

firestore.reasoning: Standardizing root collections and sub-collections for high-fidelity social features.
